translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうじゃないよね？　今さらすぎるでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's not it, right? Isn't it way too late now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人だった頃は放置するってどういう了見なのさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you mean by ignoring it when I was a demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「研究するな、って？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You mean, don't research it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の身長より頭ひとつふたつ低い家で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can you imagine living comfortably for your whole life in a house that's a head or two shorter than you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一生快適に過ごせるかい？　想像してみなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can you spend your entire life comfortably like that? Just try to imagine it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姉さんがいるし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have my sister here, and"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣営とかどうでもいいから一緒にいるけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about the faction, I just stay with her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言葉も通じない猿の群の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Among a group of monkeys who don't understand my language,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にけっこう我慢してるんだよ、僕は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm already enduring quite a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたい、広めてないし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I haven't really spread it around in the first place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えて分かるような奴いないでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no one who would understand even if I taught them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それは、驕りです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's arrogance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕組みは分からなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if they don't understand the mechanism,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その起きている現象に近づく者は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "those who come close to the phenomenon that's happening..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、あのメガネの子？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that glasses-wearing girl?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子の閃きは僕の発想とは全然別だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her inspiration is totally different from my way of thinking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんかまあ、すごいね。魔法の代わりというか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, she's amazing in a way. Like a substitute for magic,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身の回りの面白そうなこと、面白くないこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she analyzes everything around her, interesting things and boring things alike,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何でもかんでも分析していくし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she analyzes absolutely everything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕は目的のためにあらゆる手段を飛躍させたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I advanced all means for my purpose, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子はそれが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "that girl has that"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日常の欲や感情とほぼ結びついてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "almost connected to everyday desires and emotions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕から着想を得たりしてるかもしれないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she got some ideas from me, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまたま属性が近いだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "it's just that our attributes happen to be similar,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来は魔法とかからだって閃くはずだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "originally, she should also have inspirations from magic and such."
"That means..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり、封印なら彼女にした方がいいってこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words, if it's a sealing, it's better to have her do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 凡人だから、同じ凡人にも教えられるだろうし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because she's an ordinary person, she can teach other ordinary people too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………それは、できません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That, I cannot do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああそう？　じゃあ別の手段を探しなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, really? Then look for another way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時間後に姉さんとお茶なんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have tea with my sister in an hour."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ前入りしとかなくちゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I should head in early soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ミステリアさーん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Mysteria-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また何か、面白い魔法見せてくれます？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Would you show me some interesting magic again?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イッヒッヒ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehe...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、子供みたいな好奇心だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, such childlike curiosity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大物になるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll become a big deal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは……もう、割といい年なんですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha... I'm already quite grown-up, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あれ。あそこにいるの、クルックーさん……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh. Isn't that Kurukku-san over there...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっと、ヒララ鉱石の在庫は……ＯＫか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, the stock of Hirara ore is... okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ、鉱石自体の基礎研究も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to redo the basic research on the ore itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やり直してみたいなー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to start over and try it again..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、子供みたいな好奇心だね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, such childlike curiosity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大物になるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll become a big deal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは……もう、割といい年なんですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha... I'm already quite grown-up, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あれ。あそこにいるの、クルックーさん……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh. Isn't that Kurukku-san over there...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっと、ヒララ鉱石の在庫は……ＯＫか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, the stock of Hirara ore is... okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ、鉱石自体の基礎研究も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to redo the basic research on the ore itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やり直してみたいなー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to start over and try it again..."
